title: gelovolk
author: gelovolk
created_time: March 18, 2023, 02:36:23 AMLast edit: May 16, 2023, 01:06:13 AM by gelovolk
content: Thank you for participating in our bounty campaign! Rewards have been distributed and you can find confirmation on BscScan. Your contributions were invaluable to our success. Looking forward to future initiatives.https://bscscan.com/tx/0xd7521e771bb37904a3646ce4ac3bb040aa5ff2638d9ae1db04ab0171e15e97e8I am happy to inform you that Round 1 for the GwaySBC Campaign has been successfully closed. Round 2 for the GwaySBC Campaign will be coming soon.  Thank you for your participation in Round 1 and we look forward to seeing you in Round 2! WEBSITE - WHITEPAPER- ROADMAP - TELEGRAM - TWITTER - DEXTools1. 5,000 AmerG ~$5.000 are allocated for this Bounty.2. The bounty program was launched on 19.03.2023 and will run until 29.04.2023Disclaimer: By agreeing to participate in this bounty, you acknowledge that the wallet address and the email address you submitted are final and can't be changed, bounty manager reserves the right to make changes to the conditions at any time.1. All participants must join the GwaySBC's official Twitter GwaySBC, Telegram Group and Telegram Channel.2.Talking about the bounty in the project chat group will lead to immediate disqualification from the campaign and an instant ban from the company chat group.Please ask your bounty-related questions in the GwaySBC's Group.3.KYC is not required for the bounty campaign. However, the project's team has the right to require KYC for suspicious cases.4.Please note that any offensive or inappropriate behavior will lead to immediate disqualification from the campaign.5. Using multiple accounts, cheating and spamming are not allowed.6.All participants must send the Proof of Authentication post to join the bounty program.Code:#PROOF OF REGISTRATIONForum Username:Forum Profile Link:Telegram Username:Participated Campaigns: ETH Wallet Address:  Twitter             30%Telegram          20%YouTube          15%TikTok              15%Article              20%Week 1 (19.03 - 25.03)Week 2 (26.03 - 01.04)Week 3 (02.04 - 08.04)Week 4 (09.04 - 15.04)Week 5 (16.04 - 22.04)Week 6 (23.04 - 29.04)Note: Submit your weekly report on bounty thread.Rewards based on your Twitter followers:1. Accounts with more than 500 followers: 1 stake/week;2. Accounts with more than 1000 followers: 2 stakes/week;3. Accounts with more than 5000 followers: 3 stakes/week;4. Accounts with more than 10,000 followers: 5 stakes/week.Twitter Bounty Rules:1. Follow the official Twitter GwaySBC account.2. Make 3 new tweets AmerG StableCoin related and 3 retweets of pinned post from Twitter GwaySBC per week.3. Twitter post must be 100+ characters and hashtags: #AmerG #StableCoin #GwaySBC #Blockchain #Technology #Cryptocurrency WebSite: https://gwaysbc.app4. Twitter accounts must have a minimum of 500 followers.Note: Time gap between 2 tweets needs to be 12 hours minimum.1. Fill out the form here: ---> https://forms.gle/Mp3pzNSctrTmHqkj7 <--- Google form shortened.2. Submit your weekly activity log in this thread using the format below:Code:Week 1:Type of campaign: TwitterSpreadsheet N0:Tweet Link #1:Tweet Link #2:Tweet Link #3:Retweet Link #1:Retweet Link #2:Retweet Link #3:Note:  Make reports in a separate post every week. Do NOT quote your old report.Rewards:5 stakes/week1. Join and remain on GwaySBC Telegram Group and Channel.2. Write at least 1 constructive messages per day on the GwaySBC Telegram Group. Posts like: "Hello all!", "How was your day", "Good morning!" won't count.3. Deleted messages will not be counted.Bonus stakes:4. +2 stakes for wearing a "YOUR_NAME | AmerG”  or "YOUR_NAME | $AmerG”1. Fill out the form here: ---> https://forms.gle/rxr1X6mEDAdJPAfn9 <--- Google form shortened.2. Submit your weekly activity log in this thread using the format below:Code:Week 1:Type of campaign: TelegramSpreadsheet N0:Telegram username:Message Link #1:...Message Link #2:...Message Link #3:...Message Link #4:...Message Link #5:...Message Link #6:...Message Link #7:...Note:  Make reports in a separate post every week. Do NOT quote your old report.Rewards:1. Have more than 100 views: 1 stake/week2. Have more than 1000 views: 2 stakes/week3. Have more than 5000 views: 4 stakes/week4. Have more than 10,000 views: 5 stakes/week5. Have more than 50,000 views: 10 stakes/weekRules:1. Participants must have at least 100 Followers.2. Each participant can send 1 video only per week.3. Only original video content will be accepted. Do NOT copy the video from other YouTube/TikTok users.4. Face cam video will be highly recommended and considered. Video created with mobile devices and bot voices will not be rewarded.5. High engagements but poor quality video will not be rewarded. Stakes will be awarded based on the number of engagements and quality.6. Videos should never be removed. Removal/deletion will result in disqualification.7. All videos need to have a link to the GwaySBC website, GwaySBC Twitter page, GwaySBC Telegram Group or Channel.8. Participants must use #EHT #AmerG #GwaySBC hashtags in every video.9. By joining this program, all participants accept that the project's team can use all these videos as marketing materials.10.  By joining this program, all participants accept that the GwaySBC can use all these articles as marketing materials.How to join:1. Fill out the form here: ---> https://forms.gle/XWUkjfHwWUkZix8S8 <--- Google form shortened.2. Submit your weekly activity log in this thread using the format below:Rewards Article Campaign:1. Average quality: 1 stake2. Good quality: 2 stakes3. High quality: 3 stakes4. Excellent quality: 5 stakesRules:  1. Each participant can write 1 article per week.2. High engagements but poor quality articles will not be rewarded.3. Articles should be quality and unique with a minimum of 500 words.   (Participants who copy the project's website, whitepaper or ANN thread, will not receive rewards)   (You need at least 10 likes/comments/upvotes or 100 claps for your article to qualify)4. Quality articles with no engagements will be rewarded accordingly or not rewarded at all.5. Articles should be published on blogs recommended by us: Steemit, Reddit, BitcoinTalk, Medium and LinkedIn and must be publicly accessible.    (Other high-ranked blogs may be accepted) blogspot.com are not accepted6. Only quality and original content will be accepted. Articles should never be removed. Removal/deletion will result in disqualification.7. Published Articles must include at least 2 images of the GwaySBC project; Images can be found here: https://github.com/GwaySBC/media8. Published Articles must contain GwaySBC project's website link, GwaySBC Twitter page, GwaySBC Telegram Group, Channel.9. Please provide enough details of the writer at the end of the article to ensure authenticity. This will be verified10. By joining this program, all participants accept that the GwaySBC can use all these articles as marketing materials.How to join:1. Fill out the form here: ---> https://forms.gle/kKghdN287P5rHp4B9 <--- Google form shortened.2. Submit your weekly activity log in this thread using the format below:Rewards:High quality: 5 stakesGood quality: 3 stakesAverage quality: 1 stakeRules: 1. To be eligible, videos must receive a minimum of 200 views on YouTube and have a duration of no less than 3 minutes.2. Each participant can send 1 video only.3. Videos should cover a relevant topic, including project features, Tokensale, latest token updates, blockchain trends, and so forth.4. Only original video content will be accepted.5. Face cam videos are strongly recommended and will be taken into account when evaluating submissions.6. The use of bot voices will not be acknowledged or rewarded, but an animation video that incorporates them skillfully and with good quality may be considered.7. A reward will not be given for a video that is of insufficient quality. The stakes awarded will be determined by the level of engagement and the overall quality of the video.8. Videos should never be removed, Removal/deletion will result in disqualification.9. All videos need to have the project's website, Twitter page, Telegram Group and Channel, YouTube channel, or any other social media10. To ensure that the video is authentic, please provide the producer's (bounty hunter's) wallet address and adequate details about them at the end of the video. This information will be verified for accuracy.11.  By joining this program, all participants accept that the GwaySBC can use all these articles as marketing materials.How to join:1. Fill out the form here: ---> https://forms.gle/t6L9jrWZjAGa9rEA7 <--- Google form shortened.2. Submit your weekly activity log in this thread using the format below:Still to be updated, check in here next Sunday.
